meanings.definition: A cardinal number representing one thousand raised to the power of five (10^18).
meanings.sent1: The scientist calculated that a quintillion stars exist in the galaxy.
meanings.sent2: The national debt reached a quintillion due to excessive spending.
meanings.sent3: I have a quintillion chores to do before the party tonight!
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like a quintillion tiny sparks lighting up her heart.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was said to hold a quintillion gold coins, but no one had ever found it.

meanings.definition: An extremely large number or amount.
meanings.sent1: The company made a quintillion dollars in profit last year.
meanings.sent2: The library had a quintillion books, making it a book lover's paradise.
meanings.sent3: I have a quintillion reasons why chocolate is the best dessert!
meanings.sent4: The crowd at the concert seemed like a quintillion people, all cheering together.
meanings.sent5: The task seemed impossible, as it required a quintillion hours to complete.
